Travel Alternatives[TP]

3. St Nicholas Av between 191 and 168 Sts. Free transfer for M3 service.
4. Broadway between 168 and 137 Sts.

Use [A] service to/from nearby stations in Washington Heights.
Use [A] [C] service along Central Park West and 8 Av.

Due to track maintenance at 59 St-Columbus Circle, [A], [C] and [D] trains are running with delays in both directions. 

Allow additional travel time.



Planned Work
[E] Trains run local in both directions between Queens Plaza and 71 Av

Weekends, 11:30 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, until Aug 7

Trains stop at 36 St, Steinway St, 46 St, Northern Blvd, 65 St, Roosevelt,
Elmhurst, Grand Avs, Woodhaven Blvd, 63 Dr and 67 Av.

• Please allow additional travel time.

Note: No [E] trains between 71 Av and Jamaica Center during this time.




Planned Work
[E] No trains between 71 Av and Jamaica Center

[SB] Free shuttle buses provide alternate service
Weekends, 11:30 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, until Aug 7

[E] service operates between World Trade Center and 71 Av.
• Trains run local in both directions between Queens Plaza and 71 Av.

[SB] Buses operate between 71 Av and Jamaica Center, stopping at 75 Av, Union Tpke,
Briarwood, Jamaica-Van Wyck and Sutphin Blvd/Archer Av.
• Transfer between [E] trains and [SB] buses at 71 Av.
MTA LIRR will cross-honor MetroCard for travel between Penn Station and Jamaica or Kew Gardens LIRR stations. NYCT customers should present their MetroCard to the LIRR conductor.

Alternate travel notes:
For service between Manhattan and JFK Airport, use the [A] instead.
For service between Manhattan and Jamaica Center, consider the [A] and [J] via transfer at
Broadway Junction.

Due to track maintenance at 59 St-Columbus Circle, [A], [C] and [D] trains are running with delays in both directions. 

Allow additional travel time.



Planned Work
[M] No trains between Myrtle Av and Metropolitan Av

[L] trains and [SB] free shuttle buses provide alternate service
All times, until Sep 1, 2017

Weekdays:
[M] service operates between 71 Av and Myrtle Av, and via the [J] to/from Broadway Junction.

Weekends:
[M] service operates between Essex St and Myrtle Av, and via the [J] to/from Broadway Junction.

[M] trains do not operate during late nights. [TP]

[SB] Shuttle buses operate along three routes:
Shuttle-M1. Local between Myrtle Av and Fresh Pond Rd stopping at Central Av,
Knickerbocker Av, Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs, Seneca Av and Forest Av.
Shuttle-M2. Local between Myrtle Av and Metropolitan Av stopping at Central Av,
Knickerbocker Av, Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs, Seneca Av and Forest Av.
Shuttle-M3. Express between Flushing Av [J] and Metropolitan Av stopping at
Jefferson St [L] and Fresh Pond Rd.
• Transfer between trains and [SB] buses at Myrtle Av [J] [M] [Z], Flushing Av [J] [M],
Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs [L] and Jefferson St [L].

Travel Alternatives[TP]

For service between Manhattan and Brooklyn, take the [N] or [Q].
• Transfer between [D] and [N] [Q] trains via the passageway at Times Sq-42 St/Port Authority.
• In Brooklyn, transfer between [D] and [N] [Q] trains at Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr.
• Transfer between [N] [Q] and [F] at 34 St-Herald Sq.

For 7 Av, take the [E] via transfer at Times Sq-42 St/Port Authority.

For 47-50 Sts, 42 St-Bryant Pk and 34 St-Herald Sq take the [F].
• Transfer between [D] and [F] trains at W 4 St.
• Transfer between [N] [Q] and [F] trains at 34 St-Herald Sq.

For Grand St, take a [SB] bus via transfer at W 4 St or B'way-Lafayette St.

For DeKalb Av, take the [N] [Q] or [R] instead via transfer at Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr or
Times Sq 42 St/Port Authority.

For Union St, 4 Av-9 St and 25 St, take the [N] or [R] instead.
• Transfer between [D] and [N] [R] trains at 36 St.
